item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Peter Kinget Bernard J. Lechner Professor of Electrical Engineering office: CEPSR 1009 (Shapiro) email: peter dot kinget AT dot columbia dot edu office: +1-212-854-0309 fax: +1-212-932-9421 mail address: Columbia Universtiy Dept. of Electrical Engineering 1300 S.
